name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fetch Social Club Info By Max1382

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for securely handling Social Club info by encrypting the data for enhanced security.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension securely handles your Social Club information by encrypting data before storage, ensuring your sensitive information remains protected. It features automatic updates to refresh and update encrypted data when expiration times are reached. Easily clear local storage and refresh data with a single button, all while keeping your Social Club info encrypted and secure.

How to use it : more info at https://max1382.com/social_club/more-info

1. Go to any page on https://socialclub.rockstargames.com/ and open the plugin
and then press Copy Encrypted Info

2. then proceed to the page on Max1382.com to use your info
